pages.text: When starting a new Vault Adventure, you start at Vault Level 0. You level up by gaining $(l)Vault Experience$() and $(l)eating Vault Burgers$(). The maximum level reachable is $(l)Level 100.$()

pages.title: Running Vaults
pages.text: Each Vault you pursue yields $(l)Vault Experience$() depending on $(l)actions$() you perform or $(l)items$() you loot inside The Vault. Different actions and different items yield different amounts of experience. Even when you get defeated, you still receive Vault Experience. An overview of Vault Experience gained is displayed after you leave a Vault.

pages.title: Vault Burgers
pages.text: $(l)Vault Burgers$() are consumables that each yield a number of experience. The higher $(l)tier$() burger, the more experience is gained.

$(l)Burger Tiers low to high:$() $(br2) $(li)Hamburger $(li)Cheese Burger $(li)Double Cheese Burger $(li)Deluxe Cheese Burger $(li)Crispy Deluxe Cheese Burger $(li)Salty Deluxe Cheese Burger $(li)Cheese Burger Feast $(li)Spicy Hearty Burger
